# rolling-number

## Demo

[demo](https://codesandbox.io/s/nervous-tesla-syl82)

## Get Started

```
yarn add vue-rolling-number
```

or

```
npm install vue-rolling-number
```

## Usage

```
<template>
  <vue-rolling-number :from="100" :to="999" :speed="50" />
</template>

<script>
import VueRollingNumber from 'vue-rolling-number'
export default {
  components: {
    VueRollingNumber
  }
}
</script>

```
